result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

records.addlTxt:
1:43 PM Leonard Thomas Pope appears in Court, ADA Joseph M. Schiefferfor the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF177,  22TR1204 (STC) and 22TR1228 (IN). Court addresses 22TR1228. DE enters a NC on 22TR1228. Court accepts DE's plea and finds him Guilty w/60 days to pay. DE will submit a PFAC on 22CF177, State has no objection. Court will reset the STC. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 1:48 pm.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Maintain Absolute Sobriety 
Not to enter any bars, taverns or liquor stores where alcohol is the primary sales/service. 
Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.
Court finds Defendant freely, intelligently, knowingly, and understandingly made and waives constitutional right to those time requirements.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
3:11 PM Leonard Thomas Pope appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Kaitlyn Dipplito appeared via phone, ADA Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Defendant understands charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Walker is requesting a $5,000.00 w/conditions of Absolute sobriety, Not to enter any bars, taverns or liquor stores where alcohol is the primary sales/service & Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. , no objection. Court so orders. DE does not qualify for PD. ADA Walker is asking 22TR1204 the refusal to follow. Court confirms address and phone number. Waive time limits. Court adjourned at 3:20 pm.
Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Status conference on September 23, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
